TopicTitle: [Unofficial] KSP Coub challenge discussion - And community vote!

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! As many of you know, the KSP coub challenge ended last Friday on August 4th. As many of you don't know, the winner was Friend Bear, the Eighth Samurai with his entry, A Heat . . . Who?!:

I was a competitor in this as well as a good number of others. You can see a list of all who entered below. Good job on all of you who entered something! It was a blast. Literally.

I have decided to hole an UNOFFICIAL forum vote. Because there are WAY more than ten entries/competitors I cannot embed a poll. I will tally up two unofficial runner up winners below.

View the Coubs here, and post a link to which coub you like the most.

Unofficial KSP coub runner ups

1st place: Friend Bear, the Eighth Samurai - A Heat . . . Who?! (above)

2nd place:

3rd place:

It's been fun . Avera9eJoe OUT.

These are the people that entered coubs after the announcement day of September 2nd:

Luizpiloto, Xacktar, Sirine.ksp(Sirine) , Flying Beaver, Avera9eJoe, Grey Dragon, ACE OF SPACE, Cian McDonnell, Strandedonearth, Bagel Rabbit (Upsilon Aerospace), CG_CoubChannel (), Bede Nathan, Jessi Lloyd, Bill Faulkner, MrKerbMan, Kogster, Tony KLZ, FACEJJ, itssecrettoeverypony, Beytullah KuÃ…Å¸ÃƒÂ§u, and Lex Davis.

Edited October 6, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Just wanted to get a correction out there.

The winner was Friend Bear, the Eighth Samurai, but it was for "A Heat...Who?!"

Link: http://coub.com/view/3ep4i (sorry, I am not sure how to get the coub to show up in the window, here)

--------------------------------------------------

This has been corrected - Thank you!

--------------------------------------------------

No worries! It was a way fun competition and lots of good posts for it here, including Aver9eJoes's' and all those named above! -

Link: http://coub.com/tags/ksp

Very appreciative for the win, thank you KSP-TV Team and all those who liked my coub! Took a lot of effort. But all of the competitors spent a lot of time and effort on theirs', as well.

As said, lots of good posts, so lets show everyone the support they deserve!

Edited October 6, 2014 by Friend Bear

Ah sorry for the mishap! Someone misinformed me... Updating. I'm a fan of this one.

Edited October 6, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Ah sorry for the mishap! Someone misinformed me... Updating. I'm a fan of this one

Not at all! I was mixed up with the "Saturday" Squadcast being held at 5p.m. mountain time on Friday so not too surprising as many people didn't make it as I thought they would. Understandable though since they can really only rely on one time zone for announcements for consistency.

And thanks man! Yours rock, too!

Edited October 6, 2014 by Friend Bear
re-response to corrected quote

I accidentally posted the Kerbal Salute under my wife's Faceook account. As one who watched Back to the Future many times, I got a kick out of Xacktar's No Roads Needed. It's no surprise Friend Bear won, as it's a good showcase for KSP. Good job!
